b'Donburi Kazoku':
b'Yukiko is a young wife who is feeling lonely and unsatisfied. Her husband Koichi won\xe2\x80\x99t satisfy her needs, and in fact they sleep on separate beds. To add to her frustration Yukiko finds some pictures on her husband\xe2\x80\x99s cell phone \xe2\x80\x93 pictures of an unknown naked woman; also one night she sees her two children \xe2\x80\x93 who are not related by blood \xe2\x80\x93 together in bed.
